verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ah, Lord God, Thou hast made the heavens
And the earth, by Thy great power.
Ah, Lord God, Thou hast made the heavens
And the earth, by Thine outstretched arm.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nothing is too difficult for Thee (2x)
Ah, great and mighty God, great in counsel,
And mighty in deed. Nothing! Nothing!
Absolutely nothing! Nothing is too difficult for Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh Señor Jehová, creaste los cielos
Y la tierra con tu gran poder
Oh Señor Jehová
Creaste los cielos y la tierra
Con tu brazo extendido

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
/Nada es imposible para ti/(2)
grande y fuerte es Dios, grande en consejo
magnífico en hechos, nada, nada, absolutamente
nada es imposible para ti
